title: Input schema for pollyfill checker
description: Enter the start URL(s) of the website(s) to crawl, configure other optional settings, and run the Actor to crawl the pages and extract their text content.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: One or more URLs of the pages where the crawler will start. Note that the Actor will additionally only crawl sub-pages of these URLs. For example, for the start URL `https://www.example.com/blog`, it will crawl pages like `https://example.com/blog/article-1`, but will skip `https://example.com/docs/something-else`.
